venue.name: Mugar Library, First Floor Richards-Roosevelt Room

item.description: Join the Massachusetts Chapter of the Fulbright Association and the Howard Gotlieb Archival Research Center as they present East Meets West in Poetics, a poetry reading, reception and Q&A with acclaimed poets Afaa Michael Weaver and Eleanor Goodman. This event is given in tribute to Dr. Jim Reed, past president of the Massachusetts Chapter of the Fulbright Association, and is free and open to the public.
item.name: A reading: East Meets West in Poetics
